attributes.additional_details:
We have undersigned the government to call for:

A BAN on any product testing on any animal(s) either dead or alive (with the exception of animal feed/supplements) within the United Kingdom,

A BAN on the Import , Manufacture and or Sale of any products which have been tested on any animal(s) either dead or alive (with the exception of animal feed/supplements)

A BAN on the ownership of any Animal(s) or Living Creatures by/on behalf of Corporations  which are to be primarily used for testing Foods and or Supplements for Human and or Animal consumption.
